LastMinute Gifts Plus a FREE CappuccinoITS NEVER TOO LATE TO FIND THE PERFECT GIFT Dear Barnes Noblecom Customer Still shopping Dont panic At Barnes Noblecom we can help you find presents to please even the choosiest person on your list Heres how to give great lastminute gifts that will get there on time SEND A GIFT RIGHT TO THEIR DOOR Choose from more than million instock books CDs DVDs and videos including top authors and bestsellers Then order by December nd choose US Next Day Air and get it there on time You can even order gift wrapping Shop from our LastMinute Gift Guide today cgibinfloyeFBkCtnBoyGRkAR THE PERFECT ABSOLUTELY LASTMINUTE GIFT With Barnes Noblecom electronic GIFT CERTIFICATES you just choose the amount and well instantly email them to your friends and relatives Then they can order exactly what they want cgibinfloyeFBkCtnBoyGRmAT SHOP AT BARNES NOBLE BOOKSTORES As always you can visit any Barnes Noble where youll find lots of imaginative gift ideas everywhere you look While youre there have a Free cup of StarbucksR cappuccino on us Just present the coupon below at any location with an instore Cafe Find a store near you cgibinfloyeFBkCtnBoyGRnAU Stop by for a Free Cappuccino Free tallsize StarbucksR cappuccino espresso caffe latte or freshly brewed coffee or a hot tea from the Republic of TeaR at a Barnes Noble Bookstore Cafe Just bring this coupon to your nearest Barnes Noble bookstore with an instore Cafe between now and December th BOOKSELLER Use item couponfree item and enter the COUPON CODE This coupon is valid for one tallsize serving of Starbucks cappuccino espresso caffe latte or freshly brewed coffee or a hot tea from The Republic of Tea No cash exchange Offer valid at any Barnes Noble Cafe located within a Barnes Noble bookstore You must present this coupon to redeem offer This offer good through Limit one per customer PLEASE NOTE If you do not wish to receive future email updates please click here cgibinprofileyeFBkCtnBoyQ

Special LimitedTime Offer SAVE plus get FREE SHIPPING Save Today and Get Free Shipping Shop now Offer expires December Dear Barnes Noblecom Customer Order now There are only DAYS in this special EndofHolidays sale For a limited time you can save off your order of or more and if you order two or more items you will qualify for FREE SHIPPING How to Redeem Your Coupon Write down this coupon code DECSALE Add the products you want to your Shopping Cart Enter your coupon code DECSALE on the Payment page when youre ready to check out Your discount will be applied to your purchase Click Here to Start Saving cgibinfloyeFDOCtnBoyGWcAw A few things to remember about this coupon This coupon can be redeemed once with an online order totaling or more Magazine subscriptions and Gift Certificates may not be used to meet the minimum purchase requirement This coupon is not valid in Barnes Noble retail stores This offer only applies to the cost of items amounting to or more before any applicable taxes are added This offer is only valid for orders shipped using standard shipping within the US Except for discounts available through the Barnes Noble Readers Advantage Program TM this coupon may not be combined with any other offer This offer expires at pm Pacific Time Free Shipping Details cgibinfloyeFDOCtnBoyGWeAy PLEASE NOTE If you do not wish to receive future email updates please click here cgibinprofileyeFDOCtnBoyy
